candidates.title: `zcash_primitives 0.11.0`, `zcash_proofs 0.11.0`, `zcash_client_backend 0.8.0`, `zcash_client_sqlite 0.6.0`
candidates.body: Closes #765.

candidates.title: Use proptest instead of quickcheck for zcash_history tests.
candidates.body:
Part of #757; resolves duplicate `rand-core` dependencies.

Best viewed ignoring whitespace changes.

candidates.title: zcash_primitives: Downgrade to `bip0039 0.10`
candidates.body: `bip0039 0.11` switched from language function arguments to a generic parameter. We aren't ready to migrate to this yet.

candidates.title: Upgrade to redjubjub 0.7.0
candidates.body:
This removes our reliance on the following out-of-date transitive dependencies that are duplicative of more recent versions of crates we depend on:
- bls12_381 v0.7
- ff v0.12
- group v0.12
- jubjub v0.9
- pasta_curves v0.4
- reddsa v0.3

candidates.title: zcash_note_encryption: remove `recipient` parameter from `Domain::note_plaintext_bytes`
candidates.body: This then updates the `zcash_note_encryption` crate for a version 0.3.0 release.

candidates.title: Update dependencies to reflect changes in ff 0.13
Temporarily re-expose ability to construct invalid Sapling bundles
candidates.body: Until zcash/zcash#6397 is closed, this ability is needed by `zcashd` for crossing the FFI.

candidates.title: Pin the `inferno` transitive dependency to avoid MSRV errors.
`zcash_primitives 0.10.0`, `zcash_proofs 0.10.0`, `zcash_client_backend 0.7.0`, `zcash_client_sqlite 0.5.0`
candidates.body:
Closes #764.
Closes #719.

candidates.title: Bump MSRV for `zcash_primitives` and dependents to 1.60
candidates.body:
The MSRVs of the component crates are left as-is, partly because our dependencies don't require us to bump them, and partly because those crates have no pending changes and are relatively stable. We also plan to split the component crates out into a separate repository, where it will be easier to have a separate MSRV.

Closes zcash/librustzcash#759.

candidates.title: Sapling API changes
candidates.body: Closes #454.

candidates.title: Fix transparent balance error when the wallet is empty.
candidates.body: Fixes #724

candidates.title: Release `zcash_client_sqlite 0.4.0` and dependencies
candidates.body:
Closes #487.
Closes #488.
Closes #497.

candidates.title: Add ZIP 317 fee calculation strategy.
candidates.body: This builds atop #689

candidates.title: zcash_client_backend: Switch from `protobuf 2` to `prost 0.11`
candidates.body: The latter is maintained by the Tokio developers, and has easy integration with the `tonic` gRPC library which is actively maintained.

candidates.title: Add dynamic note selection that is responsive to changes in required fees.
candidates.body: This PR is best reviewed hiding whitespace changes.

candidates.title: Bump versions for zcash_address, zcash_encoding and zcash_history crates
candidates.body: This bumps `zcash_address` and `zcash_encoding` versions to 0.2. Then, it bumps `zcash_primitives` to `0.8.1` (which now depend on the new versions of `zcash_address` and `zcash_encoding`) with the goal to yank `0.8.0` which was mistakenly published prior to the version bumps of `zcash_address` and `zcash_encoding`.

candidates.title: Update zcash_primitives to orchard 0.3; release zcash_primitives and zcash_proofs 0.8.
candidates.body:
* This updates the `zcash_primitives` crate to use `orchard 0.3` which is a breaking change; we do a release of `zcash_primitives 0.8`.
* We update `zcash_proofs` to use `zcash_primitives 0.8` which is a breaking change; we do a release of `zcash_proofs 0.8`.
* We update `zcash_extensions`, `zcash_client_backend`, `zcash_client_sqlite` to use `zcash_primitives 0.8` which is a breaking change; we are not releasing these crates in this PR.
* We also update `zcash_client_backend` to use `orchard 0.3`.

candidates.title: Remove unused dependencies
candidates.body: These were mostly detected with `cargo-udeps`, for which I've also added exclusions for the dependencies it can't detect are used in doc-tests.

candidates.title: `zcash_client_backend`: Refactor tracking of `BatchRunner` heap memory usage
candidates.body:
The new approach now correctly measures the heap usage of the precomputed IVKs used for Sapling as of #633. It also fixes several bugs that resulted in undercounting.

Depends on https://github.com/zkcrypto/group/pull/37.

candidates.title: Update chacha20poly1305 dependency in zcash_primitives to 0.10
candidates.body: This makes it consistent with zcash_note_encryption. fixes #650

candidates.title: Batch scanner memory reduction
candidates.body: Ported from https://github.com/zcash/zcash/pull/6172.

candidates.title: Update unified address test vectors
candidates.body:
This updates unified address test vectors after
https://github.com/zcash-hackworks/zcash-test-vectors/pull/89 to check addresses across multiple diversifier indices, and also removes the superfluous binary encoding of UA strings.

candidates.title: zcash_client_backend: Add gRPC bindings behind feature flag
candidates.body:
The lightwalletd service file is sourced from zcash/lightwalletd@ad5ecda5fbb5e12799f926b8cd785d54fdd250c8

Closes zcash/librustzcash#585.

candidates.title: Add APIs to prepare ivk and epk and implement them for Sapling
